text: Entrance: FreeClosed: First Monday of monthTake the subway to National Assembly Station, Exit 4. Walk straight then turn right and walk straight again. KBS building is located at the end of the road. Get inside the building towards the hall.SUBWAY: 27mins: Euljiro 1 -8 stations- Dongsan – National AssemblyThe KBS Hall is a nice experience for Kpop and Kdrama lovers! I enjoyed the tour and it’s free of charge! I took pictures of the cool stuff inside the studio. It was really fun!I got to dub for a cartoon show, listened to the live radio show, got to be a newscaster for KBS 9 and even sang as a Kpop in the studio!
